Home » 5V Parivārapāḷi » 1 Bhikkhuvibhaṅga » 1.2 Dutiyabhāga
1.2.4 Saṅgahitavāra
Bhikkhuvibhaṅga
Dutiyabhāga
Saṅgahitavāra
196.
646Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā? Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ catūhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—  siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena…pe… . (1)
647Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā? Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ ekena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā—  dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena. (2)
648Saṅgahitavāro niṭṭhito catuttho.
